oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 60v.), copy completed on 25 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1192 AH [June 21, 1778 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad Amīn ibn ʻAlī Ṭāhir ibn Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad Qāsim.
With: Sharḥ Īsāghūjī / Ḥusām al-Dīn al-Kātī (ff. 1v-28v) -- Ḥāshīyah ʻalá Tahdhīb al-manṭiq / ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Yazdī (ff. 61v-142v).
